svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - September 16 2023
September 16 2023

title: "Week in Ethereum News
September 16, 2023" date: "2023-09-16"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade
‚Ä¢ Latest all core devs ‚Äì execution (ACDE) call video . Recap by Tim Beiko .¬† Notes from Tim Beiko and Christine Kim : Testing continues on
devnet-8 and MEV-Boost workflows on kurtosis Max epoch churn limit (EIP7514) added to Dencun, the maximum new stakers per epoch¬†will be
set to 8; Dankrad: EIP7514 gives time to deal with economic/tech consequences of Lido attack BLOBBASEFEE opcode (EIP7516) for L2 fee
calculations added to Dencun EIP4788 (beacon block root in EVM) being updated with changes from audits Devnet-9 to include EIP7514,
EIP7516 & EIP4788 changes, ACDC to set launch date Reth intro : EL client in Rust, hoping to join devnet-9
‚Ä¢ Testing continues on devnet-8 and MEV-Boost workflows on kurtosis
Testing continues on devnet-8 and MEV-Boost workflows on kurtosis
‚Ä¢ Max epoch churn limit (EIP7514) added to Dencun, the maximum new stakers per epoch¬†will be set to 8; Dankrad: EIP7514 gives time to deal
with economic/tech consequences of Lido attack
Max epoch churn limit (EIP7514) added to Dencun, the maximum new stakers per epoch¬†will be set to 8; Dankrad: EIP7514 gives time to deal
‚Ä¢ BLOBBASEFEE opcode (EIP7516) for L2 fee calculations added to Dencun
BLOBBASEFEE opcode (EIP7516) for L2 fee calculations added to Dencun
‚Ä¢ EIP4788 (beacon block root in EVM) being updated with changes from audits
EIP4788 (beacon block root in EVM) being updated with changes from audits
‚Ä¢ Devnet-9 to include EIP7514, EIP7516 & EIP4788 changes, ACDC to set launch date
Devnet-9 to include EIP7514, EIP7516 & EIP4788 changes, ACDC to set launch date
‚Ä¢ Reth intro : EL client in Rust, hoping to join devnet-9
Reth intro : EL client in Rust, hoping to join devnet-9
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
‚Ä¢ üö® Lido at 32.3% has reduced slightly but still very close to breaching risky 33% threshold
üö® Lido at 32.3% has reduced slightly but still very close to breaching risky 33% threshold
‚Ä¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split Consensus layer:
Prysm over 33%, a bug could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
‚Ä¢ Execution layer: Geth supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
Execution layer: Geth supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
‚Ä¢ Consensus layer: Prysm over 33%, a bug could mean loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm over 33%, a bug could mean loss of finality
‚Ä¢ Need more geographic diversity for both stakers and nodes , particularly outside of US/Can/EU
Need more geographic diversity for both stakers and nodes , particularly outside of US/Can/EU
Layer 1
‚Ä¢ Epoch churn limit increased from 11 to 12 (EIP7514 in Dencun sets to 8 for deposits)
Epoch churn limit increased from 11 to 12 (EIP7514 in Dencun sets to 8 for deposits)
‚Ä¢ MEV-build-rs alpha : MEV-Boost builder in Rust, extends Reth (EL client)
MEV-build-rs alpha : MEV-Boost builder in Rust, extends Reth (EL client)
For Stakers
‚Ä¢ Lodestar incentive program results, 86 validators to share $25k
Lodestar incentive program results, 86 validators to share $25k
‚Ä¢ Geth node running on NanoPC-T6 ($129 board), synced in 13 hours
Geth node running on NanoPC-T6 ($129 board), synced in 13 hours
‚Ä¢ Secure-signer (alpha): remote-signing inside hardware enclave
Secure-signer (alpha): remote-signing inside hardware enclave
‚Ä¢ Tor Push : proof of concept for validator privacy, push messages into gossipsub via Tor
Tor Push : proof of concept for validator privacy, push messages into gossipsub via Tor
Client releases
‚Ä¢ Consensus layer: Nimbus v23.9.0 : Hole≈°ky testnet support and simplified config for remote signers
Consensus layer:
‚Ä¢ Nimbus v23.9.0 : Hole≈°ky testnet support and simplified config for remote signers
‚Ä¢ Execution layer: Geth v1.13.0 : pruning reimplemented using path based storage (needs a resync)
Execution layer:
‚Ä¢ Geth v1.13.0 : pruning reimplemented using path based storage (needs a resync)
Research
‚Ä¢ Streamlining fast finality : single proposal and voting phase per slot using strong confirmation
Streamlining fast finality : single proposal and voting phase per slot using strong confirmation
‚Ä¢ Two-tiered staking : native liquid staking design
Two-tiered staking : native liquid staking design
EIPs/Standards
‚Ä¢ EIPs EIP7516 : BLOBBASEFEE opcode
EIPs
‚Ä¢ EIP7516 : BLOBBASEFEE opcode
‚Ä¢ ERCs (application layer): ERC7515 : NFT alternative text in metadata ERC7517 : Content consent for AI/ML data mining ERC7518 : Global
compliant STO & interoperable asset lifecycle (ERC1155 extension)
ERCs (application layer):
‚Ä¢ ERC7515 : NFT alternative text in metadata
ERC7515 : NFT alternative text in metadata
‚Ä¢ ERC7517 : Content consent for AI/ML data mining
ERC7517 : Content consent for AI/ML data mining
‚Ä¢ ERC7518 : Global compliant STO & interoperable asset lifecycle (ERC1155 extension)
ERC7518 : Global compliant STO & interoperable asset lifecycle (ERC1155 extension)
Stuff for developers
‚Ä¢ Hole≈°ky testnet didn‚Äôt launch due to misconfiguration, relaunch expected in two weeks
Hole≈°ky testnet didn‚Äôt launch due to misconfiguration, relaunch expected in two weeks
‚Ä¢ Hardhat v2.17.3 : default EVM set to Paris for solc v0.8.20+ (for L2s that don‚Äôt support Shanghai)
Hardhat v2.17.3 : default EVM set to Paris for solc v0.8.20+ (for L2s that don‚Äôt support Shanghai)
‚Ä¢ Invariant check in modifier skipped if an assembly block directly returns
Invariant check in modifier skipped if an assembly block directly returns
‚Ä¢ Overview of minimal proxies : ERC1167 variants and Clones with immutable arguments
Overview of minimal proxies : ERC1167 variants and Clones with immutable arguments
‚Ä¢ ERC4626 conformance : 20% of vaults don‚Äôt conform
ERC4626 conformance : 20% of vaults don‚Äôt conform
‚Ä¢ MinimalAccount (ERC4337): gas-optimized implementation in Huff for benchmarking
MinimalAccount (ERC4337): gas-optimized implementation in Huff for benchmarking
‚Ä¢ ERC deployments : Dune dashboard showing number of deployments for common ERCs
ERC deployments : Dune dashboard showing number of deployments for common ERCs
‚Ä¢ Huff-stack-generator : generate stack comments
Huff-stack-generator : generate stack comments
‚Ä¢ Geas (Good Ethereum Assembler): macro assembler for the EVM
Geas (Good Ethereum Assembler): macro assembler for the EVM
‚Ä¢ Slitherin (custom Slither detectors) v0.3 : adds arbitrary call detector
Slitherin (custom Slither detectors) v0.3 : adds arbitrary call detector
‚Ä¢ Vyper compiler audit competition
Vyper compiler audit competition
‚Ä¢ CTFs: ONLYPWNER : CTF platform with 9 challenges Curta CTF Murder Mystery writeup and a solution Secureum RACE #21: 8 question Solidity
quiz & answers
CTFs:
‚Ä¢ ONLYPWNER : CTF platform with 9 challenges
ONLYPWNER : CTF platform with 9 challenges

Curta CTF Murder Mystery writeup and a solution

Security
‚Ä¢ Balancer postmortem of two Linear Pools vulnerabilities : $1M bounty paid for first vulnerability and second vulnerability exploited for
$1.2M on mainnet & Optimism
Balancer postmortem of two Linear Pools vulnerabilities : $1M bounty paid for first vulnerability and second vulnerability exploited for
‚Ä¢ Browsing for bugs : finding a Premia vulnerability with $3M at risk, fixed with bounty paid
Browsing for bugs : finding a Premia vulnerability with $3M at risk, fixed with bounty paid
Ecosystem
‚Ä¢ 1 year mergeversary üêº, supply reduced by 300k ETH MEV-Boost : first year of out-of-protocol PBS
1 year mergeversary üêº, supply reduced by 300k ETH

Onchain stats
‚Ä¢ Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 7 to 411 gwei, with 15.6 gwei average Negative issuance currently at 20.6 gwei 3.9k ETH net issuance
this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 7 to 411 gwei, with 15.6 gwei average
‚Ä¢ Negative issuance currently at 20.6 gwei
Negative issuance currently at 20.6 gwei
‚Ä¢ 3.9k ETH net issuance this week
3.9k ETH net issuance this week
‚Ä¢ ETHUSD : $1,541 - 1,653, currently $1642
ETHUSD : $1,541 - 1,653, currently $1642
‚Ä¢ ETHBTC : currently 0.0616 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.0616 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
‚Ä¢ MetaMask Snaps beta : wallet plugins for transaction security, chat & non-EVM networks
MetaMask Snaps beta : wallet plugins for transaction security, chat & non-EVM networks
‚Ä¢ Uniswap UI auto detects fee on transfer tokens
Uniswap UI auto detects fee on transfer tokens
‚Ä¢ Gaslite : airdrop ETH, ERC20 & ERC721 tokens, including ETH to Friend Tech key holders
Gaslite : airdrop ETH, ERC20 & ERC721 tokens, including ETH to Friend Tech key holders

Senior Operations Security Expert wanted by EF

Regulation/business/tokens
‚Ä¢ SEC claims Stoner Cats NFTs are securities : $1 million fine, return sale proceeds & destroy NFTs held by the team Unanimous Republican
dissent from Commissioners Peirce & Uyeda Jonathan Mann‚Äôs this song is a security NFT sold for 6 ETH

‚Ä¢ DeFi Education Fund attempts to cancel a US patent claiming to invent oracles
DeFi Education Fund attempts to cancel a US patent claiming to invent oracles
‚Ä¢ Three PayPal dollars : centralized, crypto & savings, with crypto offering better protections than centralized but savings offers
deposit insurance & interest
Three PayPal dollars : centralized, crypto & savings, with crypto offering better protections than centralized but savings offers deposit
insurance & interest
‚Ä¢ FTX allowed to sell its crypto assets
FTX allowed to sell its crypto assets
General
‚Ä¢ Remove your phone number from Twitter (X) to prevent account recovery by sim swap
Remove your phone number from Twitter (X) to prevent account recovery by sim swap

transferPunk

Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup and @evan_van_ness to get most of the week‚Äôs news in
real time.
